root: ^Wow, that dude really wasn’t lying. Everyone here seems really rich and well connected. I’m going to have to step up my game if I want to survive here.
^Ha! You just come in from another town? You look dirt poor! It would take you years to even get a taste of money like mine!
^Dang, you might not be nice, but I think you’re right. I should look around town for some opportunities.
